que_0.question: By when shall the Pre-operational Space System be available ?

answers.answer: the pre-operational space system shall be available in 2013

que_1.question: What will be the minimum lifetime of each satellite after deployment ?

que_2.question: What shall the space segment provide ?

answers.answer: the space segment design shall be based on the re-use of existing telecom platforms

que_3.question: What will perform on-board software management functions ?

answers.answer: on-board storage of software in non-modifiable memories (rom) shall be limited to the strict necessary (e.g. boot sw) such that software corrections/updates can be made when the satellite is in orbit

que_4.question: Will the SCC implement authentication and authorisation operator mechanisms ?

answers.answer: the scc shall support alarm filtering and sorting according to several criteria

que_5.question: Will the ATM payload be compatible with the platform TMTC ?

answers.answer: the accommodation of ancillary payload (when applicable) shall be distinct from the atm payload accommodation

que_6.question: What will the satellite database consisting ?

answers.answer: the scc shall consist of two centres
